To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private HomingPigeon _homingpigeon;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_homingpigeon = HomingPigeon(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_homingpigeon.IsReady)
{
    var period = _homingpigeon.Period.Value;
    var current = _homingpigeon.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.homingpigeon = self.HomingPigeon(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.homingpigeon.IsReady:
    period = self.homingpigeon.Period.Value
    current = self.homingpigeon.Current.Value
